< PluginFactory > Protocol Reference

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static getPluginInstance ($sPluginDef, $sBasePath= '', $oParent=null)

Detailed Description

The PluginFactory class instantiates Plugin's that are configured in the configuration files and chains them together in a way that is similar to the Decorator Pattern.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Definition at line 11 of file PluginFactory.class.php.

Member Function Documentation

static PluginFactory-p.getPluginInstance ( $  sPluginDef,
$  sBasePath = '',
$  oParent = null 
) [static]

Get a plugin instance. This methos takes care of loading, instantiating, initializing and chaining the plugin.

Parameters:
$sPluginDef string Name of the plugin.
$sBasePath string Root path of the test case.
$oParent Plugin The plugin to chain to, or null in case of none.
Returns:
Plugin The instantiated Plugin object.
Since:
1.0
